title: Train fault causing longer travelling times on NS line

title_translations.zh-Hans: 列车故障导致南北线行程时间延长
title_translations.ms: Kerosakan kereta api menyebabkan masa perjalanan lebih lama di laluan NS
title_translations.ta: ரயில் பழுது காரணமாக NS பாதையில் பயண நேரம் அதிகரிப்பு

updates.text: NSL] CLEARED: Train services are now operating normally.
[NSL]: Estimate 10 mins additional travelling time from #MarinaBay to #AngMoKio towards JurongEast due to a train fault.
[NSL] CLEARED: Train services are now operating normally.
[NSL]: Longer travelling time expected along NS line in the direction towards JurongEast due to a train fault at Orchard station.
